_description: Configuration for constrained protein design with fixed positions

_parameter_descriptions.chains_to_design: Space-separated chain IDs to design (must match fixed_positions)
_parameter_descriptions.fixed_positions: Fixed positions per chain: '1 2 3, 10 11 12' (comma-separated for different chains)
_parameter_descriptions.num_sequences: Number of sequences to generate with constraints
_parameter_descriptions.temperature: Sampling temperature (lower values respect constraints more strictly)

active_site_preservation.description: Preserve active site residues in chain A

interface_design.description: Design interface while preserving key contact residues

binding_site_design.description: Redesign while keeping binding site residues

_constraint_format.multiple_chains: comma-separated per chain: '1 2 3, 10 11 12, 5 6' for chains A, B, C
_constraint_format.empty_constraints: Use empty string '' for no constraints

_constraint_guidelines.functional_residues: Always fix catalytic residues, binding sites, structural motifs
_constraint_guidelines.interface_residues: Consider fixing key interface contacts for protein-protein interactions
_constraint_guidelines.temperature_effects: Lower temperature (0.1) = stricter constraint adherence, higher (0.2-0.3) = more flexibility around constraints
_constraint_guidelines.constraint_density: Too many constraints (>50% of residues) may limit design space significantly
